title: I did not receive my free Riot Kayle skin.
body: Today is September the 24th and I have still not received the Riot Kayle. I received the Summoner Icon and Kayle but did not get my skin. How can I get it back?

replies.body: I did not receive my riot kayle skin :(

> [{quoted}](name=spyrodhmos,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NEmeXdzp,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-04-22T20:44:31.603+0000)
>
> I did not receive my riot kayle skin :(

Hey  spyrodhmos,

Please make sure to pay attention to the date on the thread and comments to avoid necroing it. You're not in trouble but I will be disabling further commenting on this thread. 

In regards to you not having received your Riot Kayle skin from this event, I strongly recommend submitting  a [Player Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) and letting them know as this is an account-specific problem. They should be able to look at your account history and see what's up.

Best of luck!

~Mod RookDio

There are a lot of accounts to gift and we've extended the gifting period per our current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  The gifts are distributed separately, so you won't get everything all at once.  Hang tight and the goodies will come!
